text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
During the press conference before the<n>autumn
Tenno Sho, Fuji Kiseki wows the<n>crowd with her
sleight of hand.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her smile is bright and bold now that<n>she's no
longer held back by anxiety.<n>She promises to give
them the most<n>wondrous, heart-stopping
entertainment.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her eyes are fixed resolutely on what<n>she must
do, and she strides into the<n>race with her head
held high.
